::Prowl::

Prowl speeds up, managing to avoid all but four of the lasers. The 
four that hit him hit him in the stomach and chest, leaving smoking 
dents in his armor. He aims his missiles, firing two more at 
Wildrider and then flying away from the bot.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Wildrider transforms after this miss, and Cannonballs, as he was 
expecting
> the missile fire. He lands on the ground, and is propelled forward 
by the
> explosion of the missiles beside him. He gets up, and whatever was 
left of
> his dangeling wires from his head had fallen off. His exostructure 
was
> rippe apart, all that was left was the insides of the right side, 
his left
> side of his face was not badly damaged. He starts to laugh deeply, 
and
> turns into a cackle. "Ha ha ha, me a Predacon, thats rich Maximal, 
ha ha,"
> with that he raises his scatterblaster rifle and pulls the trigger 
twice,
> sending 16 lasers a ripping the air where Prowl is.
